com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.converters
Class TextTemplateConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.converters.BaseConverter
      com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.converters.TextTemplateConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeckJSConverter, DZSlidesConverter, ImpressJSConverter, PdfConverter, RevealJSConverter, ShowerConverter
public abstract class TextTemplateConverter
extends BaseConverter

This is an extension to BaseConverter that processes configured template file with the help of Groovy's SimpleTemplateEngine.

The template has access the following variables:

  • configuration - converter's configuration object
  • document - full DOM tree of the slides document
  • body - body element
  • slides - collection of slide elements
  • title - presentation's title
  • author - presentation's author
  • company - author's employer
  • description - presentation's description
  • date - presentation's date
  • backgroundColor - optional background color
  • fontColor - optional font color
  • fontName - custom font name
  • fontLink - custom font link
  • theme - selected presentation's theme
  • logoFile - logo file name
  • outputFile - presentation's final output file name

It also provides a number of hook methods for the subclasses to extend default behavior:

  • #expandBinding(HashMap, Document, Configuration) method allows adding more binding variables available to the template.
  • transformDocument(Document, Configuration) method allows modifying DOM tree of the slides document.
